contents.name: audio
contents.description: Stereo digital, PDM Microphone MEMS (Silicon) omnidirectional (-26dB +-1dB @ 94dB SPL) solder pads.

contents.name: accel_x
contents.description: Current accelerometers x-axis. 3D digital linear acceleration sensor has a linear acceleration full scale of +-2g,+-4g,+-8,+-16 g.

contents.name: accel_y
contents.description: Current accelerometers y-axis. 3D digital linear acceleration sensor has a linear acceleration full scale of +-2g,+-4g,+-8,+-16 g.

contents.name: accel_z
contents.description: Current accelerometers z-axis. 3D digital linear acceleration sensor has a linear acceleration full scale of +-2g,+-4g,+-8,+-16 g.

contents.name: gyro_x
contents.description: Current gyro x-axis. 3D digital angular rate sensor has an angular rate of +-245,+-500,+-2000 dps.

contents.name: gyro_y
contents.description: Current gyro y-axis. 3D digital angular rate sensor has an angular rate of +-245,+-500,+-2000 dps.

contents.name: gyro_z
contents.description: Current gyro z-axis. 3D digital angular rate sensor has an angular rate of +-245,+-500,+-2000 dps.

contents.name: mag_x
contents.description: Current magnetometer x-axis. 3D digital magnetic sensor has a magnetic field full scale of +-4,+-8,+-12,+-16 gauss.
